name: Hot Dog Boy
description:
Hot Dog Boy was made in 72 hours during the Shenanijam 2018!  The theme for me was Void Sandwich so I made a game where you are Hot Dog Boy with no condiments.  Your goal is to explore the world and find four different condiments.  While you are at it you will have a chance to collect 72 coins.  If you are able to collect 9 coins very quickly you will get a coin combo.  There are eight combos in all!  Try and see if you can get them.

Movement:

Controller enabled game

Keyboard uses arrow keys to move and the space-bar to jump.
